basics.name: Jiahui Liao
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

courses: ICS 111: Introduction to Computer Science I
ICS 141: Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science I
ICS 211: Introduction to Computer Science II
ICS 241: Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science II

extracurricular.name: Association for Computing Machinery (ACM), University of Hawaii at Manoa
extracurricular.description: ACMManoa is the largest computer science organization at UH Manoa. As a marketing manager, I am responsible for creating graphics, updating promotional material, and assist in communications.

extracurricular.name: Game Dev. Club, University of Hawaii at Manoa
extracurricular.description: Game Dev is UH Manoa's only game development focused organization. In my time as a member and officer, I have worked on a third of the games produced by the club, of which vary in genre. I have led in development as well as contributed art assets, music, and code.
highlights: Lead and assist in game development projects
Organize and moderate speaker events with industry professionals
Organize and moderate social events, including related finances
Create graphics and promotional material for events and projects
Implement changes in club structure including responsibilities of officers and organization of club activities.

work.summary: Nagatani Academic Center is home to UH Manoa's Student Athelete Academic Services. As Computer Support, I maintain computer systems, provide technical support, and update the website.
highlights: Maintain and update website using knowledge of Wordpress, HTML, and CSS
Provide technical support for students and faculty
Maintain software and hardware of computer systems

volunteer.summary: Honolulu Chinatown Lions Club seeks to serve the community through volunteer work and fundraising. They are the Honolulu Chinatown chapter of Lions Club International, the world's largest service club organization.
highlights: Create and oversee development of monthly newsletter
Maintain data and records of club members and activities
Attend board meetings, assisting in problem solution and decision making

awards.title: Association of Computing Machinery Certificate of Appreciation
awards.summary: Awarded in recognition for my contributions and commitment towards Game Dev club, a Special Interest Group (SIG) under ACM.

awards.title: Stronger Together Hawaii Scholarship
awards.summary: Given to students who have been impacted by COVID-19.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship for first-time degree seeking students. Students must have a 3.5 GPA, 1200 SAT or 23 ACT upon the time of application to UH Manoa.
